column4: Is it possible to Sync an Ipod 6th Gen with Ubuntu yet? I've been searching the net for an answer but I can't find something conclusive.
I sync my nano using gtkpod
well...it was worth a shot. V6 is new stuff...will probably take a while for the devs to pick up on it
that is apple. I was amazed gtkpod would handle my nano, and it is old tech
